website_summaries.verdict: With its blend of pleasing photos, quality build, compact body and high-res screen this Olympus is an excellent camera.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value-- A Lot of Camera for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures. This camera has everything I was looking for-- long zoom, good for close shots, not too heavy/bulky, HD video capability and much more. I also like that it uses lithium battery. I've had negative experiences with rechargeable AA type batteries, even the pricey ones. The li battery on this camera lasts and lasts. Feels good in my hands; just the right combination of functionality and carry-ability. This is my 3rd Olympus camera and I've been more than satisfied with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this camera. The new features show on the screen the information of each of the features on the dial set up. I've only owned Olympus cameras since they first came out. They're the best and always have been from the first. You can't go wrong with this or any Olympus camera.
customer_reviews.author: animals

customer_reviews.title: Great little Point and Shoot.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of the photos I have taken with this little camera. It is easy to use, easy to hold, small and light enough to fit in my pocket. I bought this one for my summer vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bear

customer_reviews.title: It is a great camera and it arrived in great condition only the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great camera and it arrived in great condition only the user manuel was in Korean, so that was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Holdiman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't found something I don't like on it. Good photos, even with low light.
customer_reviews.author: andrea maccio

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Camera from Olypus that I have purchased yet! I absolutely love the stabilzer on it. No matter what I get a clear shot every time. The zoom is amazingly clear. Easy to use, small and light weight and actually easier to keep a hold of it with this design. I HIGHLY recomend this camera to everyone and especailly those that might not have as steady a hand as they would like.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Superb.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome optics. Easy to navigate menus. If you're an Olympus user, there's very little learning curve. A dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Compact , fast, clear sharp pictures
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera, and it did not require the long learning curve of a full body digital SLR. Great telephoto shots od my house projects, and really convenient to pull out to get sudden nature shots too
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: olympus sz-31mr camera
customer_reviews.text: small enough to carry in the woods while hunting. zoom is quiet and great for nature shots. camera works great and pics are clear. glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kitzmiller

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: I only hold off on giving it 5 stars because I have only had it a few months, but it is taking great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: My most awesome camera ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right before a trip to the UK and Ireland. The most awesome camera ever, and I am still getting used to the settings and modes. Beautiful pictures, full 1080p HD video, easy to use. Granted, I am a longtime Olympus fan, but I just love it. AND the guys I bought it from (Beauty of RevaleSkin) came through to get it delivered in a very short time so I could take it on the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Brian-STL

customer_reviews.title: A very good camera that met all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: A very good camera that met all my expectations. It takes very good pictures. So good that I bought a second one when my husband dropped and broke my first one.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera, great quality, very easy to use, gives a lot of features to use, etc. N/A N/A N/A.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Olympus sz-31MR.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera 5 stars because the performance is over and above for such a small camera. Has lots of features from taking a photo to edit a pic.
customer_reviews.author: Fidencia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of a kind camera. You can take video and pictures simultaneously and with so many features and functionality that you cannot find in other camera and yet it is easy to use. The quality of the combined pictures (16M) and videos (1080p) resolutions can be achieve clearly in single shooting. Very handy as no need to have a separate camera and videocam to take in any occasion. Wow, I'm amazed of this product. I believe Olympus set a standards for all camera with multiple recording features and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Minzy

customer_reviews.title: Going back to my canon
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that the zoom and the video would work well. However, when I tested it out the anytime you had to zoom you can clearly hear it. When I tested to video it had a weird clicking sound. Overall, the quality and make was not worth it to me. I returned the camera and the additional battery I had bought. It was a good thing I bought it through amazon. I'm going back to my Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Anna H

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he absolutely loved it. He did reluctantly return it because it didn't have the HDR features he was needing, but otherwise an awesome camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Sold a gray market camera.
customer_reviews.text: I was sold a gray market camera. The charger cord was the 240 volt European style and Olympus USA was not able to match the S/N for a USA warranty. I contacted Amazon and Preetham said "While we shipped your order, the inventory was provided to us by a seller, and I'm not able to send you a replacement." I would probably like the camera more if I could charge the battery to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan - Managed Property Services

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend this camera
customer_reviews.text: The SZ-31MR is noticably heavy. In addition, when this camera arrived, it was missing the USB cable for downloading pictures. I'm still trying to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great specs..hard to hold
customer_reviews.text: Love the specs and features, but the big negative is the size. I have medium size hands and the camera is a hard to hold. I would not buy this camera if I had been able to hold it. I would opt for a larger dlr. I have a full size dslr but it's too heavy. I need to find a happy medium.
customer_reviews.author: sance

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera EVER
customer_reviews.text: I did an embarrassing amount of research to finally choose a camera. After reading way too many reviews... I finally decided on this camera (about 3 years ago). Let me tell you it is the best camera I've ever had in my life. It is still on the compact side so you don't have to carry around a million pieces, but the zoom is FABULOUS. If you are hesitating on buying this camera, let me assure you - you will be ECSTATIC!
customer_reviews.author: Dana32429

customer_reviews.title: Really love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really love this camera, it did an excellent job in taking pictures and recording video in HD. The video recording came out even better than my other sony hdr-cx210 camcorder.Colors produce much better, i got a $50 rebate when it just came out.
customer_reviews.author: Zen D.

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I like Olympus SZ-31MR 16MP CMOS Camera with 24x Wide-Angle Zoom and 3-inch... arrived in time correct and I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Adilson Carlini de Araujo

product_meta.title: Olympus SZ-31MR 16MP CMOS Camera with 24x Wide-Angle Zoom and 3-inch 920k Hi-Res LCD Touch Panel (Black) (Old Model)
